thread.section_title: FlightNetwork.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightNetwork.com | www.flightnetwork.com
thread.title: Davinder Mandair

author: Davinder Mandair
title: Davinder Mandair
text: After having done numerous searches for multiple flights, I found this website which was clear and concise with a very user friendly interface. I booked three flights from Canada and in the USA. with Flights to and will be recommending them to my friends.( Update to above) Muzamil helped me to cancel and rebook a flight that I had made in error. He was courteous and professional in dealing with my problem!
